head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCKAY, THOMAS J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCKAY, THOMAS J.

block.p: McKAY-Thomas J. of Orangeburg, NY, formerly of Old Tappan, NJ, on September 29, 2000. Beloved husband of Cynthia McKay (nee Habel). Devoted father of Jared and Vanessa McKay. Loving son of Frances McKay (nee Kelly) and the late Raymond. Dear brother of Cecelia Marceaux, Robert and Michael McKay. Funeral from Becker Funeral Home, 219 Kinderkamack Rd, Westwood, NJ, on Monday, October 2, 2000, at 8:45 AM. Funeral Mass at Sacred Heart R.C. Church, Tappan, NY, at 10 AM. Interment, Rockland Cemetery, Sparkill, NY. The family will receive their friends on Saturday from 7-9 PM, and Sunday 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Memorial gifts to American Heart Association, NJ Affiliate Memorials Program, 2550 Route 1, North Brunswick, NJ 08902-4301, would be appreciated.
